segments.text: Oh , yes Mr.Chou . We have been looking forward to this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: These are all my personal documents about my education and working experience you asked for . And I have to be off for an important meeting now . If you think I am right for the job , please keep me informed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I will call you if you give me your name card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , but I don't have one with me right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , just tell me your phone number .
segments.speaker: S2
